assetProfile.address2: 1st Floor East Wing, Equinox Business Park LBS Marg, Kurla (West)
assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: Crompton Greaves Consumer Electricals Limited manufactures and markets consumer products in India. It operates in two segments, Electrical Consumer Durables and Lighting Products. The company offers air purifiers; fans comprising ceiling, table, pedestal, wall mounted, domestic exhaust, and special fans; professional LED and conventional lighting, solar, and lighting automation products, as well as lamps and consumer luminaires; and residential, agricultural, and specialty pumps. It also provides garment care, food preparation, cooking, and beverage/breakfast appliances, as well as geysers, room heaters, air coolers, and power solutions. In addition, the company designs, manufactures, tests, and supplies LED street lights and poles. Its solutions are used in home/residential, hospitality, retail shops/showrooms, industry, gifting, institutional/bulk purchases, outdoor, and office markets. Crompton Greaves Consumer Electricals Limited was incorporated in 2015 and is based in Mumbai, India.
